html: 10.23.18  7:24 pm   How much time does it take you to think of your lyrics?

10.23.18  7:21 pm   when will you release more reality videos?

      take your time, as much as you like i guess.

10.23.18  7:21 pm   "the Moon is made of Cheese (but i cant taste it)" is probably my favorite song of yours right now. What made you cut it off when you did,

     did you like it,

     and what do you think you did differently compared to some other songs?

10.23.18  6:52 pm   I think everyone has a word that is ingrained into our lives. I think my word is focus. I have ideas, but they re broad and undefined, and all my life, people have been telling me to focus; pick one thing and stick to it. I know that I'll have to choose a path that will close doors and open others, I just have to find it.

      What word is ingrained into your life?

      A reoccurring theme, so to speak?

10.23.18  6:32 pm   What's it called when you have a minor chord, but there's a major 6th thrown into the mix?

      I have a song where it starts on G D A in the left hand below Bb E Bb in the right hand. What would you call this?

      Also there's another one with G and D in the bass

      plus C E F and Bb in the right, what's that called?
10.23.18  6:08 pm   How do I stop feeling sad
10.23.18  6:05 pm   okay so animals are people and we are people and we are also animals... maybe everything is the same

10.23.18  6:00 pm   My health class told me I should start thinking about what my career is going to be. I thinking of making video games or making music. I know you are more of a music guy but what do you think I should do

10.22.18  10:26 am   You know how you always never tell us what the name of the next song in its entirety until the whole song is released? How about changing that up and just telling it to us? Gotta see if that works better or worse than not telling us.
